title.rendered: India beat Pakistan 2-1, break record for winning most Men’s Hockey Junior Asia Cup titles

content.rendered:
India won the 2023 Men’s Junior Asia Cup of Hockey by defeating Pakistan 2-1 in the championship game.

Read Also: I don’t think drama-free Grand Slam can happen for me: Djokovic

India broke the record for the most Asia Cup titles in junior men’s hockey victories. India won the championship for the fourth time, passing Pakistan, who had previously won it three times. India scored goals in the final through Araijeet Singh Hundal and Angad Bir Singh.
